exceptions.message: SQLSTATE[22P02]: Invalid text representation: 7 ERROR:  invalid input syntax for integer: "discusslab.png" (SQL: select "threads".*, (select count(*) from "replies" where "threads"."id" = "replies"."thread_id") as "replies_count" from "threads" where "id" = discusslab.png limit 1)
SQLSTATE[22P02]: Invalid text representation: 7 ERROR:  invalid input syntax for integer: "discusslab.png"

hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
The SELECT statement has no WHERE clause and could examine many more rows than intended
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan
